column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I'm not worthy!  I'm not worthy!  Went on their free night (Thursday from 5:00pm to 8:00pm) and managed to catch some Gaugins
column12: Degas....the list of heavy hitters goes on and on.  I'm still spinning from shock
column13: awe and sheer wonderment.  Seriously I'm just not that worthy.  A+ all round and definitely not to be missed.
